languages.text: "Усмири свою алчность, Каллигос. Все, что ты имеешь, принадлежит {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императору{/g}, а ты — не более чем наместник. И все, чем владеет почтенн{mf|ый|ая} — тоже Его собственность. А ты ведь не посмеешь посягнуть на то, что принадлежит Ему?"

traits.locale_text: "Уйми свои аппетиты, Каллигос. Все, что ты имеешь, принадлежит Императору, а ты — не более чем наместник. И все, чем владеет почтенн{mf|ый|ая} — тоже Его собственность. А ты ведь не посмеешь посягнуть на то, что принадлежит Ему?"

languages.text: "Rein in your avarice, Calligos. All that you own belongs to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, and you are nothing more than a steward. And all of the esteemed {name}'s possessions are likewise His property. Surely you would not dare to lay claim to that which belongs to Him?"
languages.original_text: "Усмири свою алчность, Каллигос. Все, что ты имеешь, принадлежит {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императору{/g}, а ты — не более чем наместник. И все, чем владеет почтенн{mf|ый|ая} — тоже Его собственность. А ты ведь не посмеешь посягнуть на то, что принадлежит Ему?"

"Rein in your avarice, Calligos. All that you own belongs to the Emperor, and you are nothing more than a steward. And all of the esteemed {name}'s possessions are likewise His property. Surely you would not dare to lay claim to that which belongs to Him?"

"Rein in your avarice, Calligos. All that you own belongs to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, and you are nothing more than a steward. And all of the esteemed {name}'s possessions are likewise His property. Surely you would not dare to lay claim to that which belongs to Him?"

"Rein in your avarice, Calligos. All that you own belongs to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, and you are nothing more than a steward. And all of the esteemed {name}'s possessions are likewise His property. Surely you would not dare to lay claim to that which belongs to Him?"

languages.text: 「我欲を抑えたらどうだ、カリゴス。お前が所有するものはすべからく{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}に帰属する、お前は管財人にすぎない。そして{name}の所有物すべてが同じく皇帝の財産となる。恐れ多くも皇帝の所有物を自分のものだと言うつもりはないよな？」
languages.original_text: "Rein in your avarice, Calligos. All that you own belongs to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, and you are nothing more than a steward. And all of the esteemed {name}'s possessions are likewise His property. Surely you would not dare to lay claim to that which belongs to Him?"

traits.locale_text: 「我欲を抑えたらどうだ、カリゴス。お前が所有するものはすべからく{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}に帰属する、お前は管財人にすぎない。そして{name}の所有物すべてが同じく皇帝の財産となる。恐れ多くも皇帝の所有物を自分のものだと言うつもりはないよな？」

languages.text: “收起你那副贪婪的嘴脸，卡里戈斯。你自以为拥有的一切都属于{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}，你充其量不过是祂的管家罢了。而尊敬的{name}所拥有的一切财产，也同样属于帝皇。莫非你竟敢觊觎祂的财富？”
languages.original_text: "Rein in your avarice, Calligos. All that you own belongs to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, and you are nothing more than a steward. And all of the esteemed {name}'s possessions are likewise His property. Surely you would not dare to lay claim to that which belongs to Him?"

traits.locale_text: “收起你那副贪婪的嘴脸，卡里戈斯。你自以为拥有的一切都属于{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}，你充其量不过是祂的管家罢了。而尊敬的{name}所拥有的一切财产，也同样属于帝皇。莫非你竟敢觊觎祂的财富？”

languages.text: «Contenga su avaricia, Calligos. Todo lo que gobierna es propiedad del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}, usted no es más que un administrador. Del mismo modo, las posesiones de{mf|l| la} estimad{mf|o|a} {name} también pertenecen al Emperador. No irá a intentar reclamarlas para sí, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "Rein in your avarice, Calligos. All that you own belongs to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, and you are nothing more than a steward. And all of the esteemed {name}'s possessions are likewise His property. Surely you would not dare to lay claim to that which belongs to Him?"

traits.locale_text: «Contenga su avaricia, Calligos. Todo lo que gobierna es propiedad del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}, usted no es más que un administrador. Del mismo modo, las posesiones de{mf|l| la} estimad{mf|o|a} {name} también pertenecen al Emperador. No irá a intentar reclamarlas para sí, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: « Tenez donc votre avarice en laisse, Calligos. Dois-je vous rappeler que tout ce que vous possédez appartient à l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} et que vous n'êtes finalement rien de plus qu'un intendant ? Il en va de même pour l'honorable {name}. Vous n'oseriez quand même pas vous emparer de ce qui Lui appartient, si ? »
languages.original_text: "Rein in your avarice, Calligos. All that you own belongs to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, and you are nothing more than a steward. And all of the esteemed {name}'s possessions are likewise His property. Surely you would not dare to lay claim to that which belongs to Him?"

traits.locale_text: « Tenez donc votre avarice en laisse, Calligos. Dois-je vous rappeler que tout ce que vous possédez appartient à l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} et que vous n'êtes finalement rien de plus qu'un intendant ? Il en va de même pour l'honorable {name}. Vous n'oseriez quand même pas vous emparer de ce qui Lui appartient, si ? »

languages.text: "Zügelt Eure Raffgier, Calligos. Euer gesamter Besitz gehört dem {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g}, und Ihr seid lediglich ein Truchsess. Genau wie alle Besitztümer {mf|des|der} geschätzten {name} Sein Eigentum sind. Und Ihr wollt doch nicht etwas beanspruchen, das Ihm gehört?"
languages.original_text: "Rein in your avarice, Calligos. All that you own belongs to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, and you are nothing more than a steward. And all of the esteemed {name}'s possessions are likewise His property. Surely you would not dare to lay claim to that which belongs to Him?"

traits.locale_text: "Zügelt Eure Raffgier, Calligos. Euer gesamter Besitz gehört dem {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g}, und Ihr seid lediglich ein Truchsess. Genau wie alle Besitztümer {mf|des|der} geschätzten {name} Sein Eigentum sind. Und Ihr wollt doch nicht etwas beanspruchen, das Ihm gehört?"

languages.text: "Tamahkârlığı bir yana bırak Calligos. Sahip olduğun her şey {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'a{/g} ait, sense yalnızca idarecisin. Kıymetli {name}, tüm mallarının O'na ait olduğunu biliyor. O'nun olana konmaya cüret edecek hâlin yok, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "Rein in your avarice, Calligos. All that you own belongs to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, and you are nothing more than a steward. And all of the esteemed {name}'s possessions are likewise His property. Surely you would not dare to lay claim to that which belongs to Him?"

traits.locale_text: "Tamahkârlığı bir yana bırak Calligos. Sahip olduğun her şey {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'a ait, sense yalnızca idarecisin. Kıymetli {name} de tüm mallarının O'na ait olduğunu biliyor. O'nun olana konmaya cüret edecek hâlin yok, değil mi?"
